name: MUTINY (Hamza Yuşa Delipoyraz)
description:
A group of friends goes to an abandoned church to hang out after their friend's recent death, however, it turns into a nightmare when a disturbed mind awakens amongst them.

Presented by TEAM GIRAFFE

Writer - Okan Ataç

Font/UI Design - Mete Şimşekol

Art Design - Hamza Yuşa Delipoyraz

Music Arrange/Direction - Okan Ataç, Hamza Yuşa Delipoyraz 

Unity Development - Emre Avcı, Yağız Kurt   

All the rights of the music tracks are belong to their respective owners. This game has been made only for educational purposes and does not hold any profit motive.
